name: Chaotic Void (itch) (Chili Turtle)
description:
Where are you? Are you in a white void, or is the void filled with white?

Info:

Made in 4 Days...

The game is inspired by minimalism art and the minimalism movement, there slogen is "less is more", they life just with the bare minimum. So in that spirit I gave my self a challenge.

Challenge:

-No UI components
-Make all music and soundeffects from 1 sample

Gameplay:

Shoot Waves of Enemy and loot and reload in a chaotic FPS

Controls:

WASD = Move

Left Mouse = Shoot/Grab

R = Pick up

E = Inventory
